quotes.text: A room without books is like a person without a soul.
quotes.author: O. P. Dovzhenko

quotes.text: ...A person who exists without a book seems strange and unnatural.
quotes.author: T.G. Shevchenko

quotes.text: A book is a source of education, knowledge, and if enrichment, then cultural and spiritual enrichment.
quotes.author: M.T. Rylsky

quotes.text: Whoever loves the book will go far in his development. The book saves the soul from woodiness.
quotes.author: T.G. Shevchenko

quotes.text: ...books are written in order to be read, and read in order to reflect on what has been read.
quotes.author: I.Ya. Franko

quotes.text: Books are rivers that water the seas.
quotes.author: Yaroslav Mudry

quotes.text: Books are needed to remind a person that his original thoughts are not so new.
quotes.author: A. Lincoln

quotes.text: A house without a book is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.text: A person with a good book in his hands can never be lonely.
quotes.author: K. Goldoni

quotes.text: Books are best friends. You can turn to them in all difficult moments of life. They will never betray.
quotes.author: A. Dode

quotes.text: Some books make us dream, others immerse us in reality, but all of them are imbued with the most important thing for the author - sincerity.
quotes.author: P. Coelho

quotes.text: Mind did not come from books, but books came from mind.
quotes.author: G. Skovoroda
